altTitles.zh: 隐居十万年，后代请我出山

altTitles.en: Coming Out Of Seclusion After A Hundred Thousand Years
Coming Out Of Seclusion After A 100000 Years

description.en:
One hundred thousand years ago, the old ancestor of the Forgotten Immortal Sect Chen Xuan who was once known as a peerless existence in the world, retires himself from the limelight, little did anyone know that the reason behind this was that he could no longer breakthrough due to the malfunction of his system.

One day, a female disciple of the clan’s Lineage prays for His help, which causes the system to successfully reboot…

As long as he cultivates his descendants, he can continue to get stronger and can continue to rule the world For Ages!

A Supreme Emperor, who has been in seclusion for 100,000 years, has come out with a brand new System at his disposal…
description.id: 100.000 tahun yang lalu, Chen Xuan, patriark dari Sekte Immortal yang Terlupakan, tidak terkalahkan di dunia tetapi pensiun di puncak. Tidak ada yang tahu bahwa dia tidak dapat terus menerobos karena kesalahan pada jari emas dari sistem. Suatu hari, seorang murid perempuan dari keturunan sekte datang untuk meminta bantuan, dan sistem berhasil dihidupkan kembali... Selama dia mengkultivasi keturunannya, dia dapat terus menjadi lebih kuat dan terus memerintah selamanya! Kaisar Langit Xuan, yang telah bersembunyi selama 100.000 tahun, menunjuk ke gunung dengan jari emas baru...
